App
public class App extends Object
The application entry point for the Hospital Management System.

  • Constructor Details

      public App()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the Hospital Management System. This method should be called before running the application.

      It will: - Initialize the managers and load data from the repository files. - Create the login system and set it as the current system. - Add a shutdown hook to save data when the application exits.

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the Hospital Management System. This method should be called after initializing the application.

      It will run the current system until it returns null. After that, it will print a message and exit the application.

      It will also pause and clear the console before continuing to the next system. This is to allow the user to read the output before continuing.

      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the application has not been initialized.
